duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform critical analysis to drive strategies on customer pricing and margin optimization initiatives.
Build highly quantitative financial models that optimize margins on offer strategies and product mix.
Lead price tests across channels to identify appropriate pricing on new & existing products.
Analyze large volume of data and identify areas of opportunities for increased revenue, cost reduction, and customer retention.
Perform analysis on customer pricing initiatives as well as competitive analysis.
Support forecasting initiatives, conduct variance analysis, present results to stakeholders, and articulate key insights and recommendations for improved performance.
Collaborate with IT and Business Intelligence teams to prototype dashboards that visualize critical KPI.
Exhibit strong business acumen, influence strategic business decisions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors / Master’s degree in Data Analysis, Business Analytics, or a related field
